name: Delivery Food Sim- Japan Osaka
description:
How long has it been since you traveled abroad?
Want to travel to Osaka, Japan right now?
Want to experience life in Osaka?

Now Delivery Food Sim Osaka is the world's first open-world arcade action 3d car deliver game that combines a new 2022 simulation bike game with a virtual tour
Simulate role-playing metaverse driving life as a food delivery deliver driver in Osaka
In-depth tour by deliver bicycle in open world racing Osaka attractions
And you'll have a cool home in Osaka, Japan
Drive around the open world maps or get out of the car, adventure deliver bicycle, control your officer and have fun in our new 2022 simulator game.

Delivery Food Simulator Features:
100% 1:1 Osaka City Photorealistic 3D Model,
Dotonbori, Hozenji, Shinsaibashi, American Village,
Collect travel stamps
Real weather system
Amazing selection of different types of vehicles.
Realistic vehicle driving features and physics.
Time and day system
Next-gen Traffic racing system
Next-gen AI system
Ultra-realistic city traffic (cars, vans, trucks, motorcycles, bicycles).
Racing in the city
Real ambient sound
Pedestrian traffic makes the city feel alive.
Physical deliver bike
Realistic AAA game
Random delivery Mission
World Leaderboard

Want to travel to Japan right now? Play Now!
